MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Aston by Budworth  and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the lines to patrol and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12noon on Jan 30, 2021.
